title: Cabot Shores Wilderness Resort
description: A 55-acre private sanctuary with breathtaking views, a 2007-foot ocean beachfront, a lakefront on Church Pond, waterfall fed Indian Brook, and all modern conveniences. Offers various types of comfortable accommodation (chalets, lodge, yurts, domes, tipi, treehouse) plus a bistro specializing in vegetarian and vegan fare using fresh, wild, and local ingredients.
